pr_title: Fix rolling update of existing pods when scaling up/down

timeline.message:
Fix rolling update of existing pods when scaling up/down

Signed-off-by: Jakub Scholz <www@scholzj.com>

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if the name (do)commonCertificatesDiffer is better?
timeline.author: tombentley

replies.bodyText: I think common is a bit confusing. I went with doExistingCertificatesDiffer - hope that works for you.
replies.author: scholzj

timeline.bodyText: We've got this same pattern of method calls repeated three or four times in this PR. Surely we can factor out a common method which takes the secret name and BiFunction whose argument is a method reference to kafkaExporter::generateSecret or whatever?
timeline.author: tombentley

replies.bodyText: I migth have done this a bit differently, but I factored it out. and re-used it in all 4 methods.
replies.author: scholzj

timeline.bodyText: If we're changing the name of these anyway, I wonder if we should drop the is part. The tense disagrees with the changed suffix, so it reads a bit awkwardly.
timeline.author: tombentley

replies.bodyText: Yeah, now when you say it it sounds weird :-D
